item.title: Biden-nominated federal judge extends hold on Trump NIH research funding cuts
item.description: Biden-nominated federal Judge blocks the National Institutes of Health from applying a standard indirect cost rate of 15% across the board for grants.

item.title: Trump could sell Nancy Pelosi Federal Building 'at fair market value' under new GOP bill
item.description: A House GOP bill would allow President Donald Trump to move forward with selling the Nancy Pelosi Federal Building.
